0.1.0.name: wordpress/link-view
0.1.0.description:
The purpose of this plugin is to to show the wordpress integrated links in a list or a slider by using a shortcode. It is also possible to include the images. Use the shortcode [linkview] to add the Links/Blogroll in your site. A detailed description of all available shortcode-attributes to modify the output can be found on the admin page under Links -> Link View. There is also a widget available where all attributes of the linkview shortcode can be set.

If you want to follow the development status have a look at the git-repository on github.
